import React from "react"; import { Button, Col, Container, Form, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Icon } from "@iconify/react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; const Contact = () => { const sendmail = (e) => { e.preventdefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_6h6k7io", "template_6mfh53b", e.target, "YDLrs830Pb34_YtYM" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); }; return (
contact me

mail me

name: email: We'll never share your email with anyone else. Message

contact me

: 7741086495

: chikuu_9800

: shubhamchikhale4@gmail.com

); }; export default Contact;
